title: WeWork’s New Crisis: ‘Workplaces Will Never Be the Same After This’
description: WeWork executives wanted to pack as many people as possible into each of its shared workspaces. This strategy is now a major liability
content: (Bloomberg)WeWork executives used to obsess over the number of people they could pack into each of the companys shared workspaces. They said a more crowded office helped make the space feel active and spark collaboration when desk mates slid past each other i… [+5990 chars]
